channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lampost leaning over, 13th October
item.description:
Newly installed lampost on Blandford Road is starting to lean over quite significantly. Concerned that it may eventually fall, causing danger to pedestrians and road users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working on Pembroke Walk, near number 16, 13th October
item.description:
The street light beside the wall at number 16 Pembroke Walk has stopped working. It’s attached to a green post and usually lights the pavement and nearby wall, but it’s been out today. Please inspect and repair, as the area is quite dark at night. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Pembroke Walk, Kensington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 13th October
item.description:
There is graffiti on the walls of the Concrete roundabout at the junction of Chislehurst Rd, Sidcup & The Sidcup Bypass / Perry St, Bromley. There is also graffiti on the road sign on the roundabout / RAMP leading onto the Sidcup bypass going towards Central London.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frognal Corner, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In front of Honest Burgers / 117 Tottenham Court Road, 13th October
item.description:
The massive tree / trees in front of Honest Burgers is growing incredibly close to the residential flats (basically reaching towards them), even top floor flats. This has caused fly infestation issues even when windows are fully closed and locked, and means that windows cannot be opened for fresh air. Flies have been spotted inside residential flat for the past 8 months, but only became a serious issue over the past 3-4 months where it has caused an infestation and another infestation brewing despite closed and locked windows. Please may the tree be trimmed much further back so it is not within reach of the residential flats above Honest Burgers (including top floor flats).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Tottenham Court Road, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pool of water, 13th October
item.description:
Approaching crown roundabout northbound on A21, just before zebra crossing. For over two weeks there has been a large pool of water mixed with leaves, blocking one lane. I cycle and I have to pull out in front of traffic to avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A21, Bromley Common, London

item.title: Water coming up out of the drains along the main road outside the play park opposite Rookery gardens, 13th October
item.description:
This has been ongoing for months and getting worse. Reported initially to Thames water as there is a large water leak further up the road towards Park Road. After speaking to a Thames water engineer, I was told if the leak is on the opposite side of the meter then Thames water won’t touch it as it’s a private issue. However, this has had a negative impact on the road and drains since May 2025. The leak is not fixed and water comes up out of the drains flooding the kerb side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary lights coned off area NO ONE WORKING THERE AGAIN !, 13th October
item.description:
These temporary traffic lights have caused absolute mayhem today at 5pm - tailbacks to Royal parade Chislehurst - access by ambulance to Queen marys hospital blocked - Queen Mary's roundabout at a stand still - and, as of lunch time today - NOT A WORKMAN IN SIGHT !!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 cars idling their engines, 13th October
item.description:
Please have the parking attendant come by more often to Essendine Road out of hours as their music school in the evening has families who leave their cars running for 30 minutes while they wait for their children. I took a video and it's too big to go on this system but there were 5 cars blocking the road and with their engines on for more than 15 minutes. There is no waiting room at the school so they leave our street as one! HELP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Essendine Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
